title.narrative: NUTRITION CLUSTER FUNCTIONS EFFECTIVELY

description.narrative: Effective and coordinated Nutrition cluster with improved information management at national and sub national levels in humanitarian situations., which contributes to Early Detection And Treatment Of Malnutrition, Nutrition And Emergencies. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: NUTRITION Outcome: Improved coverage and increased utilization of quality and equitable nutrition services for under five children, adolescent girls and mothers in most deprived provinces and areas.

sector.narrative: Preparedness and response for maternal and child nutrition
Technical assistance - Early detection and treatment of malnutrition
